sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react';
import { View, StyleSheet, Image, Text, Button, TouchableOpacity, Switch, Picker } from 'react-native'

export default function PostForm() {
    return (
        <View style={styles.container}>
            <View style={styles.border}></View>
            <Text style={styles.label}>Location</Text>
            <Picker>
                <Picker.Item label="Beijing" value="bj" />
                <Picker.Item label="New York" value="ny"/>
                <Picker.Item label="Ottawa" value="ot"/>          
            </Picker>

            <Text style={styles.label}>Status</Text>
            <View style={styles.input}>
                <Text style={{color:'white'}}>Online</Text>
                <Switch
                />
            </View>

            <Text style={styles.label}>Interested</Text>
            <View style={{ flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'flex-start', marginBottom: 26 }}>
                <View style={styles.category_active}>Museum</View>
                <View style={styles.category_normal}>Finance</View>
                <View style={styles.category_normal}>Music</View>
                <View style={styles.category_normal}>Travel</View>
                <View style={styles.category_normal}>Foodie</View>

            </View>

            <TouchableOpacity>
                <Text style={styles.button}>
                   Next
                </Text>
            </TouchableOpacity>
            {/* <View style={{ flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'flex-start' }}>
                <View>
                    <Image style={styles.photo} source={require('E:/Upwork/React Native/AwesomeProject/assets/photo.png')} />
                    <Image style={styles.badge} source={require('E:/Upwork/React Native/AwesomeProject/assets/badge.png')} />
                </View>
                <Text style={styles.username}>Hengzhi Huang</Text>
            </View>

            <View style={{ flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'flex-end' }}>
                <View style={styles.rect}>
                    <Image style={styles.icon} source={require('E:/Upwork/React Native/AwesomeProject/assets/email.png')} />
                </View>
            </View> */}
        </View>
    )
}

const styles = StyleSheet.create({
    container: {
        borderRadius: 30,
        paddingLeft: -21,
        paddingRight: -21,
        // Left: 21,
        backgroundColor: '#212027'
    },

    button: {
        backgroundColor: '#FF7C24',
        borderRadius: 12,
        paddingTop: 18,
        paddingBottom: 18,
        textAlign: 'center',
        fontSize: 18,
        color: '#FFFFFF'
    },

    label: {
        fontSize: 16,
        lineHeight: 21,
        marginTop: 24,
        marginBottom: 11,
        alignItems: 'center',
        color: '#FFFFFF'
    },

    input: {
        backgroundColor: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.1)',
        borderRadius: 12,
        paddingLeft: 21,
        paddingRight: 21,
        flexDirection: 'row',
        justifyContent: 'space-between',
        height: 54,
        alignItems: 'center'
    },

    category_active: {
        backgroundColor: '#FFFFFF',
        color: '#000000',
        fontWeight: 600,
        borderRadius: 14,
        paddingLeft: 17,
        paddingRight: 17,
        paddingTop: 5,
        paddingBottom: 5,
        marginRight: 6,
      },
      category_normal: {
        backgroundColor: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.1)',
        color: '#FFFFFF',
        fontWeight: 500,
        borderRadius: 14,
        paddingLeft: 17,
        paddingRight: 17,
        paddingTop: 5,
        paddingBottom: 5,
        marginRight: 6,
      }

})
